lead_paragraph: GOLEMBIEWSKI--Robert T. (1932-2016). Distinguished Research Professor Emeritus at the School of International and Public Affairs at the University of Georgia, died January 1, 2016 in Athens, GA. A Trenton, NJ native, he was a pioneering scholar and management consultant who shaped corporations and government entities and authored some 75 books and 1,000 scholarly articles. Mourned by colleagues; wife Peggy; children Alice H.G. Phillips, Hope OBrian, Geoffrey; grandchildren Elizabeth, Eleanor; Hannah Griffin; Daniel, Faith OBrian; Matthew, Stephen Phillips. 1/3

headline.main: Paid Notice: Deaths  GOLEMBIEWSKI, ROBERT T
